argument.description: integer-expression An expression that returns a value that is of an integer data type (SMALLINT, INTEGER, or BIGINT).
An expression that returns a value that is of an integer data type (SMALLINT, INTEGER, or BIGINT).
integer-expression An expression that returns a value that is of an integer data type (SMALLINT, INTEGER, or BIGINT).
An expression that returns a value that is a decimal data type.
An expression that returns a value that is a decimal data type.
An expression that returns a value that is a decimal floating-point data type (DECFLOAT).
An expression that returns a value that is a built-in character string data type.
An expression that returns a value that is a built-in character string data type.
An expression that returns a value that is a built-in graphic string data type.
An expression that returns a value that is a built-in binary string data type.
An expression that is of one of the following data types: DATE The result is the character string representation of the date in the format specified by the second argument.
An expression that returns a Boolean value (TRUE or FALSE).

description: The CHAR function returns a fixed-length character string representation of a value of a different data type.
